details:
Dates is a small, lightweight calendar.  Dates features an innovative, unified,
 zooming view and is designed for use on hand-held devices, such as the Nokia
 770 or the Sharp Zaurus series of PDAs.

 This flavour is suitable for desktop systems such as GNOME; for the Hildon
 flavour of Dates, see the dates-hildon package.
 suite::gnome, uitoolkit::gtk, use::timekeeping,
 works-with-format::TODO, works-with::pim
